1: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן <sup>7692 </sup> <n>Shiggaion</n> לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁ֥ר <sup>7891 </sup> <n>which he sang</n> לַיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> דִּבְרֵי־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>concerning the words</n> כ֝֗וּשׁ <sup>3568 </sup> <n>of Cush</n> בֶּן־ יְמִינִֽי׃ <sup>1145 </sup> <n>Benjamite</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אֱ֭לֹהַי <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> בְּךָ֣ חָסִ֑יתִי <sup>2620 </sup> <n>in thee do I put my trust</n> הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <sup>3467 </sup> <n>save</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> רֹ֝דְפַ֗י <sup>7291 </sup> <n>me from all them that persecute</n> וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>me and deliver</n>
2: פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>Or</n> יִטְרֹ֣ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>Lest he tear</n> כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>like a lion</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק <sup>6561 </sup> <n>rending [it] in pieces</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מַצִּֽיל׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>while [there is] none to deliver</n>
3: יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אֱ֭לֹהַי <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> עָשִׂ֣יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>if I have done</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>this if there be</n> עָ֥וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> בְּכַפָּֽי׃ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>in my hands</n>
4: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> גָּ֭מַלְתִּי <sup>1580 </sup> <n>If I have rewarded</n> שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י <sup>7999 </sup> <n>unto him that was at peace</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה <sup>2502 </sup> <n>with me (yea I have delivered</n> צוֹרְרִ֣י <sup>6887 </sup> <n>is mine enemy</n> רֵיקָֽם׃ <sup>7387 </sup> <n>him that without cause</n>
5: יִֽרַדֹּ֥ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>persecute</n> אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <sup>341 </sup> <n>Let the enemy</n> נַפְשִׁ֡י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>and take</n> וְיִרְמֹ֣ס <sup>7429 </sup> <n>[it] yea let him tread down</n> לָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> חַיָּ֑י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>my life</n> וּכְבוֹדִ֓י ׀ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>mine honour</n> לֶעָפָ֖ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>in the dust</n> יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and lay</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
6: ק֘וּמָ֤ה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <sup>639 </sup> <n>in thine anger</n> הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <sup>5375 </sup> <n>lift up</n> בְּעַבְר֣וֹת <sup>5678 </sup> <n>thyself because of the rage</n> צוֹרְרָ֑י <sup>6887 </sup> <n>of mine enemies</n> וְע֥וּרָה <sup>5782 </sup> <n>and awake</n> אֵ֝לַ֗י <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>for me [to] the judgment</n> צִוִּֽיתָ׃ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>[that] thou hast commanded</n>
7: וַעֲדַ֣ת <sup>5712 </sup> <n>So shall the congregation</n> לְ֭אֻמִּים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>of the people</n> תְּסוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>compass thee about</n> וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and over</n> לַמָּר֥וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>thou on high</n> שֽׁוּבָה׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>for their sakes therefore return</n>
8: יְהוָה֮ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יָדִ֪ין <sup>1777 </sup> <n>shall judge</n> עַ֫מִּ֥ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> שָׁפְטֵ֥נִי <sup>8199 </sup> <n>judge</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> כְּצִדְקִ֖י <sup>6664 </sup> <n>according to my righteousness</n> וּכְתֻמִּ֣י <sup>8537 </sup> <n>and according to mine integrity</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
9: יִגְמָר־ <sup>1584 </sup> <n>come to an end</n> נָ֬א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>O</n> רַ֨ע ׀ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>Oh let the wickedness</n> רְשָׁעִים֮ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> וּתְכוֹנֵ֪ן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>but establish</n> צַ֫דִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the just</n> וּבֹחֵ֣ן <sup>974 </sup> <n>trieth</n> לִ֭בּ֗וֹת <sup>3826 </sup> <n>the hearts</n> וּכְלָי֗וֹת <sup>3629 </sup> <n>and reins</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> צַדִּֽיק׃ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>for the righteous</n>
10: מָֽגִנִּ֥י <sup>4043 </sup> <n>My defence</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is with</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[is] of God</n> מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>which saveth</n> יִשְׁרֵי־ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>the upright</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in heart</n>
11: אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>judgeth</n> צַדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> וְ֝אֵ֗ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>and God</n> זֹעֵ֥ם <sup>2194 </sup> <n>is angry</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> יֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[with the wicked] every day</n>
12: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָ֭שׁוּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>If he turn</n> חַרְבּ֣וֹ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>his sword</n> יִלְט֑וֹשׁ <sup>3913 </sup> <n>not he will whet</n> קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>his bow</n> דָ֝רַ֗ךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>he hath bent</n> וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>and made it ready</n>
13: וְ֭לוֹ הֵכִ֣ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>He hath also prepared</n> כְּלֵי־ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>for him the instruments</n> מָ֑וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n> חִ֝צָּ֗יו <sup>2671 </sup> <n>his arrows</n> לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים <sup>1814 </sup> <n>against the persecutors</n> יִפְעָֽל׃ <sup>6466 </sup> <n>he ordaineth</n>
14: הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יְחַבֶּל־ <sup>2254 </sup> <n>Behold he travaileth</n> אָ֑וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>with iniquity</n> וְהָרָ֥ה <sup>2029 </sup> <n>and hath conceived</n> עָ֝מָ֗ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>mischief</n> וְיָ֣לַד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and brought forth</n> שָֽׁקֶר׃ <sup>8267 </sup> <n>falsehood</n>

16: יָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> עֲמָל֣וֹ <sup>5999 </sup> <n>His mischief</n> בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon his own head</n> וְעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> קָ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ <sup>6936 </sup> <n>upon his own pate</n> חֲמָס֥וֹ <sup>2555 </sup> <n>and his violent</n> יֵרֵֽד׃ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>dealing shall come down</n>
17: אוֹדֶ֣ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כְּצִדְק֑וֹ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>according to his righteousness</n> וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <sup>2167 </sup> <n>and will sing praise</n> שֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>to the name</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <sup>5945 </sup> <n>most high</n>
